description: Ran`s older twin sister. She is often annoyed by her sister, who often calls her `Clone`. Although she initially appears to help Nao stop Ran`s crazy plans, it is later revealed that she is a lesbian who has become interested in Nao`s lips as well as seems to have a harem of girls after her attention. In the end, she accidentally kisses Iroha and takes a liking to her instead.
name: Yatagai Rin
